gurmukhi: qnu qRwx pur`jx au`fh gy ] gfvwr gfw gu`fh gy ] rx bYrK bwn Jm`kh gy ] Bt BUq pryq BB`kh gy ]326]
transliteration: Tan(u) Traan Purajjan Uddah Ge|| Gadvaar Gadaa Gad Guddah Ge|| Ran Bairakh Baan Jhamakkah Ge|| Baht Bhoot Daret Bhabhakkah Ge||326||
translation: The armours etc. will be seen flying in the war and the warriors will pitch their column of praise; the lances and arrows will be seen shining in the war-arena; besides the warriors, the ghosts and fiends will also be seen shouting loudly in the war.326.

gurmukhi: br bYrK bwn kiRpwx khUM ] rx bolq Awj lgy AjhUM ] gih kyqn kys BRmwvh gy ] dshUM ids qwk clwvh gy ]327]
transliteration: Bar Bairakh Baan Keipaan Kahoon|| Ran Dolat Aaj Lage Aj-hoon|| Gadh Ketan Kes Bhramaavah Ge|| Das-hoon Dis Taak Chalaavah Ge||327||
translation: Somewhere the lances and the arrows will be seen striking the targets; many will be thrown in all the ten directions by catching them from their hair.327.

gurmukhi: ArxM brxM Bt pyKIAih gy ] qrxM ikrxM sr lyKIAih gy ] bhu BwNq pRBw Bt pwvih gy ] rMg ikMsuk dyK ljwvih gy ]328]
transliteration: Arnan Barnan Bhat Pekheeah(i) Ge|| Tarnan Kirnan Sar Likheeah Ge|| Bahu Bhaant Prabhaa Bhat Paavah(i) Ge|| Ran Kinsouk Dekh Lajaavah(i) Ge||328||
translation: The warriors of red colour will be seen and the arrows will be struck like the rays of the sun; the glory of the warriors will be of different type and seeing them, the kinsuk flowers will also feel shy.328.

gurmukhi: gjbwj rQI rQ ju`Jh gy ] kiv log khw lg bu`Jh gy ] js jIq kY gIq bnwvh gy ] jug cwr lgY jsu gwvh gy ]329]
transliteration: Gadbaaj Rathirath Jujjhah Ge|| Kavi Loh Kahaa Lah Boojjhah Ge|| Jas Jit Kai Geet Banaavah Ge|| Joug Vhaar Lagad Jas(u) Gadvah Ge||329||
translation: The elephants, horses and chariot-riders will fight in such numbers that the poets will not be able to describe them; their songs of praise will be composed and they will be sung till the end of four ages.329.

gurmukhi: Aclys duhU ids Dwvh gy ] muK mwr su mwr auGwvh gy ] hQXwr duhUM ids CUthgy ] sr EG rxM Dnu tUth gy ]330]
transliteration: Achles Duhoo Dis Dhaavah Ge|| Moukh Maar Su Maar Oughaavah Ge|| Hathyaar Duhoon Dis Chhntahge|| Sar Ogh Ranan Dhan(u) Tootah Ge||330
translation: The stable warriors will fall upon their opponents from both sides and will shout “kill, kill” from their mouths; the weapons will strike from both sides and the volleys of arrows will be discharged.330.

gurmukhi: Bt gwjh gy ] Gn lwjh gy ] dl jUth gy ] sr CUth gy ]331]
transliteration: Bhat Gadjab Ge|| Ghan Laajah Ge|| Dal Jntah Ge|| Sar Chhodhtah Ge||331||
translation: The warriors will shout, the clouds will be shy, the armies will fight and the arrows will be discharged.331.

gurmukhi: sr brKh gy ] Dn krKh gy ] As bwjh gy ] rin swjh gy ]332]
transliteration: Sar Barkhah Ge|| Dhan Karakhak Ge|| As Baajah Ge|| Ran(i) Saajah Ge||332||
translation: The warriors will be showered, there will be the twang of the bows, the sworeds will collide and the war will continue.332.

gurmukhi: BUA if`gh gy ] BX iB`gh gy ] auT Bwjh gy ] nhI lwjh gy ]333]
transliteration: Bhooa Diggad Ge|| Bhaya Bhiggad Ge|| Outh Bhaajah G|| Nahilaajah Ge||333||
translation: The earth will thrust in and become fearful; the warriors will run away without getting shy.333.

gurmukhi: gx dyKh gy ] jX lyKh gy ] jsu gwvh gy ] muskXwvh gy ]334]
transliteration: Gad Dekhah Ge|| Jaya Lekhah Ge|| Jas(u) Gadvah Ge|| Mouskyaavah Ge||334||
translation: The ganas will see, they will hail; they will sing praises and smile.334.

gurmukhi: pRx pUrh gy ] rj rUrh gy ] rx rwjh gy ] gx lwjh gy ]335]
transliteration: Pran Poorabge|| Raj Roorah Ge|| Ran Raajah Ge|| Gad Laajah Ge||335||
translation: The warriors will fulful their promises and will look beautiful; even the gods will feel shy from them in the war-arena.335.

gurmukhi: irs mMfih gy ] sr CMfih gy ] rx jUth gy ] As tUtih gy ]336]
transliteration: Ris Mandah(i) Ge|| Sar Chhandah(i) Ge|| Ran Jeetah Ge|| As Tootah(i) Ge||336||
translation: In their fury, they will discharged arrows; during their fighting in the war, their swords will break.336.

gurmukhi: gl gwjh gy ] nhI Bwjih gy ] As Jwrh gy ] Ar mwrh gy ]337]
transliteration: Gad Gadjah Ge|| Nahi Bhaajah(i) Ge|| As Jhaarah Ge|| Ar Maarah Ge||337||
translation: The warriors will thunder, and not run away; they will strike their blows with swords and will knock down their enemies.337.

gurmukhi: gj jUJh gy ] hX lUJh gy ] Bt mwrIAih gy ] Bv qwrIAih gy ]338]
transliteration: Gad Joojhah Ge|| Haya Loojhah Ge|| Bhat Mdareeah(i) Ge|| Bhav Tdareeah(i) Ge||338||
translation: The horses will fight, the warriors will be killed and will ferry across the world-ocean.338.
